column5: A tiny lake house (380 sq. ft.) with exceptional views. Sits on cliff overlooking lake. Hang out on top deck (the rest; under construction). Grandfathered in existing before the city. There's an extra room (nursery - I keep closed off unless need for baby). King size sterns@fosters Bed, 9 ft long extra wide couch fits two for sleep  Favorites: Waking up, drinking coffee overlooking water. Evening has boats traveling into cove headed home for the night.   2015 JET SKI RENTAL AVAIL 75 HR
